changelog_entries.message: Noticed this while doing some work around the health bar. The flash just wasn't playing due to an oversight in the miss-finish-animation logic. I've also adjusted the flash a bit.

changelog_entries.message: [MPEG-4 Part 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MPEG-4_Part_2) is a video coding standard that sits "between" H.262 and H.264. Xvid, DivX and some less known formats implement it.
changelog_entries.message_html: MPEG-4 Part 2 is a video coding standard that sits "between" H.262 and H.264. Xvid, DivX and some less known formats implement it.

changelog_entries.message:
Adds invites for multiplayer matches. Players can be invited by right clicking their profile in the user list (F9 menu).

https://github.com/ppy/osu-server-spectator/assets/8039761/d945cf2d-d1ef-4d2b-8faf-2691bd59731a

We will add more places to trigger the invite from in the future!

changelog_entries.title: Remove no longer used scoring difficulty attributes
Apply various fixes and cleanup to spinner logic
Bring back shader workaround to fix blur on iOS
Change osu!mania "perfect" judgements to only award bonus score
Persist the state of "show speed changes" between editor sessions
Don't upload replays for failed scores
Clear pre-existing bindings of same key combination to single action
Fix various new rider EAP inspections
Add ability to revert slider settings to default when double-clicking nub
Adjust slider repeat animation on legacy skins to closer match stable
Add an "Adjust pitch" switch to DT/HT
Fix + improve diffcalc command for comment-based execution
changelog_entries.message:
The biggest change here is to use `actions-cool/check-user-permission` to check permissions. My intention is for only those with write permissions to this repo to be able to run the action via commenting `!diffcalc`.

The text at the top of the workflow details how to use this.

A second, somewhat important change is to run the timeout job on the self-hosted runner, since it has different usage limits to the GH runners. This was missed in my initial implementation, but the limits are appropriate for self-hosted runners.
changelog_entries.message_html:
The biggest change here is to use actions-cool/check-user-permission to check permissions. My intention is for only those with write permissions to this repo to be able to run the action via commenting !diffcalc.

The text at the top of the workflow details how to use this.

A second, somewhat important change is to run the timeout job on the self-hosted runner, since it has different usage limits to the GH runners. This was missed in my initial implementation, but the limits are appropriate for self-hosted runners.

Fix "Floating Fruits" mod not flipping playfield properly
Adjust slider ends to be more lenient during very fast sliders
changelog_entries.message:
On very fast sliders, you now only need to be tracking somewhere in the last 36ms, rather than precisely at the (hidden) position of the last tick.

changelog_entries.title: Change beatmap listing key to `B` to match `Ctrl`-`B` shortcut
changelog_entries.message: `B` is also better than `D` because the button says `browse`. This matches `P` for `play` and `E` for `edit`.
changelog_entries.message_html: B is also better than D because the button says browse. This matches P for play and E for edit.

changelog_entries.title: Fix incorrect volume on some beatmaps
SFX tweaks
changelog_entries.message:
A bunch of little fixes grouped together:

- Fixes toolbar ruleset buttons not having hover sounds
- Replaces `NowPlayingOverlay` pop-in/pop-out sounds with newer generic overlay pop-in/pop-out ones
- Changes `NewsCard` select samples from `Default` sample set to `Button`
- Reduces `LoginOverlay` sample panning to match `NowPlayingOverlay`
- Changes back button sample set (in `KeyBindingPanel`) from `ButtonSidebar` to `Default`
- Adds keypress feedback/sound when binding keys (in `KeyBindingPanel`)
- Changes `RevertToDefaultButton` from `Button` sample set to `Default`
changelog_entries.message_html:
A bunch of little fixes grouped together:

  • Fixes toolbar ruleset buttons not having hover sounds
  • Replaces NowPlayingOverlay pop-in/pop-out sounds with newer generic overlay pop-in/pop-out ones
  • Changes NewsCard select samples from Default sample set to Button
  • Reduces LoginOverlay sample panning to match NowPlayingOverlay
  • Changes back button sample set (in KeyBindingPanel) from ButtonSidebar to Default
  • Adds keypress feedback/sound when binding keys (in KeyBindingPanel)
  • Changes RevertToDefaultButton from Button sample set to Default

changelog_entries.title: Fix circle scale not matching stable due to missing multiplier
changelog_entries.message: This fixes some replays incorrectly having misses due to a floating-point scale mismatch.
changelog_entries.message_html: This fixes some replays incorrectly having misses due to a floating-point scale mismatch.

changelog_entries.title: Localisation updates
Throw exception when pushing a screen at OnExiting without blocking
Limit image size in comments
Fix spinner cheese by accounting for spin directionality
changelog_entries.message: You now need to spin in one direction for a full spin in order to increment the total spin count.
changelog_entries.message_html: You now need to spin in one direction for a full spin in order to increment the total spin count.

changelog_entries.title: Improve mouse interactions at song select
Add ability to search for difficulty names using square brackets
Fix spinner ticks not playing samples correctly sometimes
changelog_entries.message: This was probably revealed by the lowering of the spinner cap, which made the ticks more spread out and made this issue more likely to occur.
changelog_entries.message_html: This was probably revealed by the lowering of the spinner cap, which made the ticks more spread out and made this issue more likely to occur.
